location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 19: William Hornby, Daniel Draper, Henry Moore, Nathaniel Stackhouse, William Ashburner and Andrew Ramsay, Council at Bombay Castle, to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 16 March 1779, encloses extracts from the Honourable Company's commands (no. 20, dated 19 March 1778), which concern the appointment of writers, the King of Denmark's Asiatic company, and the woollen trade.
